articles.title: Pokémon Sword and Shield expansion launching June 17 - Polygon
articles.description: The Pokémon Company will launch its first expansion for Pokémon Sword and Shield on June 17. A second expansion, The Crown Tundra, is expected to be released in fall 2020. A ton of new Pokémon will be added to the game.
